attributes.additional_details:
The hypocrisy that was displayed by Theresa May on 16/10/2012 displays fully well how unfit she is for her current position.

She allowed the extradition of a Muslim man with aspergers syndrome, Talha Ahsan to be deported to America even when he pleaded not guilty.
She allowed Babar Ahmad (another Muslim) to be extradited to America even though British courts were not able to prosecute him for over 7 years due to a lack of evidence.
Yet she steps in and does everything in her power to prevent the extradition of Gary Mckinnon, a non Muslim man who has pleaded guilty to his crimes, he also has aspergers syndrome. The only difference between him and Talha is that he pleaded guilty and he is not Muslim, where as Talha pleaded innocent and was a Muslim.

She must be removed from her position for having double standards and showing clear racism and Islamaphobic behavior.
